_header: The poor man overall lieth still
_description: On poverty — one couplet translating ‘Pauper vbique iacet dum sua bursa tacet’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
Þe pore man oueral litȝ stilleQuil is pours is nouth at is
                    wille
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 32.
